review: Cream works great on rash that could not be identified when biopsy done.  I get diarrhea though, especially bad if use too much cream.  Use sparingly!  I only use as needed for flare ups.

Kenalog-10 (triamcinolone):Epidermal cyst: I thought it was a pimple near the side of chin. I attempted bursting it but it only got bigger.The problem had been there a while, I tried ignoring it!My dermatologist said it was a cyst (epidermal). She gave me the steroid injection and told me that in 2-3days I should have results but allow 6 weeks for full results)I just received the shot this morning and I already see positive results.
